chapters.title: Chapter 46: A Message Out of the Shadow
chapters.info: Comar, p. 535 (429)—One of the two men Mat overhears while inside the palace in Caemlyn. He is given orders to see that Elayne dies quietly as well as for Egwene's and Nynaeve's heads (as well as Elayne's) to be brought to him. The other man, the man who gave the orders, was Gaebril. See also Gaebril.
